name: Musical Dream Note
description:
This is the story of a girl that want to fight and achieve her dream with her friend. 4 girls that are going to go their musical journey. Anne Notedream is a girl with a slight fear against music. When she goes into highschool she met 3 girl that have interest in music composition. Anne want to fight her fear and overcome it. She joined their music composition club to fight and realise their dream..

This visual novel is in development.

The build file is a dummy.

Please look on my devlog post for further information.
